kb3.name: kb3_sum_corp
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_sum_corp` ( `csm_crp_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `csm_shp_id` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `csm_kill_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `csm_kill_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `csm_loss_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `csm_loss_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`csm_crp_id`,`csm_shp_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM;
